features: FACE EXFOLIATOR SCRUB: Formulated with gentle yet powerful exfoliators, including bamboo extract, fruit acids, and probiotics, this hydrating facial scrub gives you smoother, softer, and brighter skin.

FRUIT ACIDS FOR SKIN-RENEWAL: By stimulating cellular turnover, the six alpha hydroxy acids in our exfoliation formula help further reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and discoloration over time.
COLLAGEN PRODUCTION: The glycolic acid and other active ingredients in our citrus-scented facial scrub stimulate the production of collagen, improving skin firmness and elasticity.

BRIGHTENING AND EVEN SKIN TONE: For best results, exfoliate 1-2 times a week; for extra sensitive/redness-prone skin, we recommend exfoliating with a hydrating facial serum, such as the Mad Hippie Vitamin A Serum or the AHA Exfoliating Peel.
MAD HIPPIE CARES: Our facial serums and skin care line contains only natural ingredients that are fragrance-free, cruelty-free, and vegan.
body.description: Micro-exfoliants join forces with 6 alpha hydroxy acids plus probiotics to brighten, soften & smooth. Physical exfoliants, bamboo & volcanic ash, gently buff away dry, dull skin, while half a dozen AHAs, including glycolic & mandelic acid, offer a gentle chemical exfoliation that leaves you glowing! + Probiotics to soothe and nourish A true dermabrasion treatment that can be used up to 2x weekly for an at-home spa experience!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us We were young, newly married, starry-eyed dreamers yearning for adventure. With hearts filled with wanderlust, we packed our life into two suitcases, and moved to Central America. We fell in love with the simplicity of life in a place that rises and sets with the sun - a place where tides, not traffic, determine the course of your day. And, Sam found surfing...an instant passion that led him to the water every day. Life was good, but our skin started to suffer the consequences of hours in the equatorial sun. Driven by a passion for simplicity, clean ingredients, and a desire to create naturally-based, effective skincare that could serve our fellow community of adventurers, explorers, and dreamers, Mad Hippie was born. Mad Hippie has given us the opportunity to work with some amazing people, and create the kind of company that we dreamed of - one that is forward thinking with regard to sustainability, one that listens to its customers, and one that gives back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is the best. Follow with the triple-c night cream (I use them together once a week) and your face wakes up feeling firm and soft! The back of the jar doesn’t say to apply to a wet face. I highly recommend doimg so. And a tiny bit goes a long way. The jar lasts me a year. One of my all time fav products. Smells nice too!

reviews.reviewerName: Super cute and soft. The perfect sleeping buddy
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Happy hippie lol.this feels so good on your skin. Gets rid of dry flakes. Dead skin. I buy monthly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m a fan.
reviews.reviewText: Feels great after a wash. Smells great too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Rub on for 30 seconds and leave on for 3 minutes. Rinse off and your face is smooth and tighter. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this. I use it once to twice a week and my skin is looking better. The scooper is cute… I just wish it was a spatula because the scrub gets stuck in the scoop part and when I rinse it I feel like I’m wasting some of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After falling in love with Mad Hippie's Ultra-Sheer Body SPF, I decided to give their Microdermabrasion Facial a try when I was on the hunt for a good exfoliator. This product does not disappoint. It gets the job done without irritating my sensitive skin. I love that the ingredients are natural. I will definitely repurchase. I would like to add that Mad Hippie's customer service department is extremely helpful; they respond to messages quickly and are committed to quality and customer satisfaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dry skin saver
reviews.reviewText: I was in desperate need of a good exfoliation and hydration. This is it. My skin feels so smooth and fresh after use. Love.

reviews.reviewTitle: Your skin feels as smooth as a baby's bottom!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a big Mad Hippie fan. I was introduced to the line a year ago exactly now, and every time they release a new product I look forward to using them and the Microdermabrasion Facial scrub was no different. I absolutely love how gentle the scrub is on your face, but it is powerful. It leaves my face feeling clean and stripped of any dirt or excess oil and so smooth and soft, and the after you use it the GLOW on your face is so incredible. It does not make your skin dry or feeling rough. The bonus is that the ingredients are super clean, smells amazing and cruelty free! I would highly recommend it (and do so to all my friends already :))!

Leaves my face so smooth and clean. The dullness is gone. Also works great on exfoliating ingrown hairs under my chin. I e tried many products to help get rid of these pesky hair bumps and Mad Hippie does the job! Thank you!

This is my new go to when my skin needs a little pick me up. When my skin feels uneven and looks dull, I use this scrub. I rub it in, wait and 3 minutes later I'm left with fresh, soft and smooth skin. The scrub is fine, fresh smelling and hydrating. Did I mention quick shipping? My order was delivered within 24 hours!

Excellent product. I'm a big fan of the Mad Hippie (their vitamin C is amazing) brand and this one does not disappoint. I have sensitive skin and found that certain microdermabrasion brands left my skin feeling too raw. Not the case here. Highly recommended for those with sensitive skin. A little goes a long way, so you definitely get your money's worth.

This product is fantastic. Smells really nice and doesn't irritate my skin. Will definitely buy it again. However the top was scratched. It doesn't matter for my own personal use but if I wanted it as a gift I wouldn't order it again.
